author: dougm
msg: fix bug that would hose child if a croak() happened, be it from a
syntax error, Carp::croak(), etc.  remove child_terminate() hack that
was blaming the Perl stack being corrupt

msg: eechk..  It passes perl -c now, really.

author: ask
msg: Apache::StatINC can now be configured to write debug stuff with

author: dougm
msg: perl_startup() will now check the Apache.pm $VERSION
